<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ghostly Resistance](/Feats.aspx?ID=3498) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 47</row>

**Archetype** [Ghost](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=177)

**Prerequisites**
[Ghost Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3496)

</column>

---

Your ghostly form becomes innately weaker but also gains resistance to many forms of damage. Your maximum HP is reduced by your level. You gain resistance 1 to all damage except for [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=75), [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128), and any damage done by a weapon with the [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297) rune (or any other source that acts like a _ghost touch_ rune). This resistance increases to 2 if the source is non-[magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103).

 At 10th level, the resistance increases to 2, or 4 if the source is non-magical. At 16th level, the resistance increases to 3, or 5 if the source is non-magical.
name: Ghostly Resistance
